Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the shovel-ready housing program
Summary: Establishes the shovel-ready housing program under which certain municipalities, at their option, may pre-authorize parcels of property for the construction of housing; establishes a shovel-ready community tax rebate for taxpayers residing in municipalities that opt-in to the shovel-ready housing program; provides for annual apportionment to municipalities that have certified participation in the shovel-ready housing program.
LawCode: Add ยง150-a, Pub Hous L; amd ยง606, Tax L; add ยง54-n, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the shovel-ready housing program
